Detailed Description

The ColorMatrix is a 5x5 matrix that manipulates the value of a Color. Because AggOO is aimed at being mostly compatible with GDI+, and the GDI+ ColorMatrix is little more than a 5x5 matrix with no methods, this class will also be fairly bare. Use ColorMatrixExt for more useful methods to adjust the matrix and manipulate a Color object.
